articles.title: Microsoft introduces AI-powered cybersecurity assistant - HT Tech
articles.description: The Microsoft tool, named 'Security Copilot', is a simple prompt box that will help security analysts with tasks like summarizing incidents, analyzing vulnerabilities and sharing information with co-workers on a pinboard.

articles.title: Elon Musk and tech execs call for 'pause' on AI development - Cointelegraph
articles.description: An open letter urging for a temporary pause on AI development has received support from Elon Musk, Steve Wozniak and other AI experts, who are concerned that the race to advance AI is getting out of control.
articles.content:
More than 2,600 tech leaders and researchers have signed an open letter urging a temporary pause on further artificial intelligence (AI) development, fearing profound risks to society and humanity.
